main event: A witness observed a single unidentified object in the sky for about 15 minutes on December 16, 1966 in Kettering, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared solid and larger than a bright star, with a pink color.
The object moved slowly and appeared to stand still at times, flashing and hovering.
The witness had seen a similar object on a prior occasion.
The Air Force requested the witness to complete a detailed report form (AFD Form 164) for further evaluation.
The report indicates that attempts were made on any aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
photographs: yes, the report indicates photographs were obtained
